mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.user_id AS "userId", a.number AS "number", a.gross_amount AS "grossamount", a.payment_amount AS "paymentAmount", a.actual_amount_paid AS "actualAmountPaid", a.deductiona AS "deductiona", a.integral AS "integral", a.health_beans AS "healthBeans", a.is_freight AS "isFreight", a.total_weight AS "totalWeight", a.freight_weight AS "freightWeight", a.freight AS "freight", a.management_cost AS "managementCost", a.province_cost AS "provinceCost", a.city_cost AS "cityCost", a.district_cost AS "districtCost", a.harvest_integral AS "harvestIntegral", a.harvest_health_beans AS "harvestHealthBeans", a.address_id AS "addressId", a.distribution_mode AS "distributionMode", a.tracking_no AS "trackingNo", a.pay_mode AS "payMode", a.type AS "type", a.status AS "status", a.out_time AS "outTime", a.out_status AS "outStatus", a.pay_time AS "payTime", a.refund_reason AS "refundReason", a.refund_explain AS "refundExplain", a.is_deleted AS "isDeleted", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.update_time AS "updateTime"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sd_order( user_id, number, gross_amount, payment_amount, actual_amount_paid, deductiona, integral, health_beans, is_freight, total_weight, freight_weight, freight, management_cost, province_cost, city_cost, district_cost, harvest_integral, harvest_health_beans, address_id, distribution_mode, tracking_no, pay_mode, type, status, out_time, out_status, pay_time, refund_reason, refund_explain, is_deleted, create_time, update_time )VALUES ( #{userId}, #{number}, #{grossAmount}, #{paymentAmount}, #{actualAmountPaid}, #{deductiona}, #{integral}, #{healthBeans}, #{isFreight}, #{totalWeight}, #{freightWeight}, #{freight}, #{managementCost}, #{provinceCost}, #{cityCost}, #{districtCost}, #{harvestIntegral}, #{harvestHealthBeans}, #{addressId}, #{distributionMode}, #{trackingNo}, #{payMode}, #{type}, #{status}, #{outTime}, #{outStatus}, #{payTime}, #{refundReason}, #{refundExplain}, #{isDeleted}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sd_order SET user_id = #{userId}, number = #{number}, gross_amount = #{grossAmount}, payment_amount = #{paymentAmount}, actual_amount_paid = #{actualAmountPaid}, deductiona = #{deductiona}, integral = #{integral}, health_beans = #{healthBeans}, is_freight = #{isFreight}, total_weight = #{totalWeight}, freight_weight = #{freightWeight}, freight = #{freight}, management_cost = #{managementCost}, province_cost = #{provinceCost}, city_cost = #{cityCost}, district_cost = #{districtCost}, harvest_integral = #{harvestIntegral}, harvest_health_beans = #{harvestHealthBeans}, address_id = #{addressId}, distribution_mode = #{distributionMode}, tracking_no = #{trackingNo}, pay_mode = #{payMode}, type = #{type}, status = #{status}, out_time = #{outTime}, out_status = #{outStatus}, pay_time = #{payTime}, refund_reason = #{refundReason}, refund_explain = #{refundExplain}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted}, create_time = #{createTime}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE id=#{id}
UPDATE sd_order SET is_deleted = #{DEL_FLAG_DELETE} WHERE id=#{id}
UPDATE sd_order SET is_deleted = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} WHERE id=#{id}
